name: CFRange
desc: A structure representing a range of sequential items in a container, such as characters in a buffer or elements in a collection.

items.name: var length: CFIndex
items.desc: An integer representing the number of items in the range. For type compatibility with the rest of the system, LONG_MAX is the maximum value you should use for length.

items.name: var location: CFIndex
items.desc: An integer representing the starting location of the range. For type compatibility with the rest of the system, LONG_MAX is the maximum value you should use for location.
